dePerserij is een onderdeel van evenemen: dePerserij is a part of event location deFabrique, situated at the border of Maarssen and Utrecht. In dePerserij you will find enormous scaffoldings, which used to support large printing presses.
Binnen deze locatie hebben wij beschikki: Within this location, we have a large plenary hall at our disposal, and aside from that a smaller hall and a lobby, where you will be welcomed and which will be used to enjoy the lunch, drinks and dinner, surrounded by the company of our sponsors.
Voor de studenten die komen uit de richt: Students leaving from Groningen, Enschede, Eindhoven, Leiden or Nijmegen, will be able to travel with a chartered touring car to the location of the congress. The departure times will be announced soon. Students leaving from Utrecht and Amsterdam can use public transport to travel to Maarssen station, where they will be picked up by a (shuttle) bus.
Zonder onze partners is het organiseren: This event would not have been possible without the support of our partners. The following partners are supporters of AnonymIT.
Dit jaar hebben 7 actieve leden van Stud: This year, seven active members of student association Sticky in Utrecht, have been given the honor to organize a SNiC congress in the fall of 2014.
De commissie, bestaande uit zowel inform: The committee includes both computer science and information science students and consists of:
De Stichting Nationaal informatica Congr: The Foundation National informatics Congress (SNiC) was founded in December 2004. The foundation aims to stimulate the interest in the knowledge of the information and communications technology and the business aspect and its applications. It hopes to achieve this with the organization of an annual national congress with a computer science related subject.
Rob de Wit, commissaris extern: Rob de Wit, commissioner of external affairs
Samantha van Dalen, commissaris logistie: Samantha van Dalen, commissioner of logistic affairs
U kunt contact met ons opnemen met de vo: The committee can be contacted using the following credentials:
Hoe verandert Bitcoin de toekomst?: How will Bitcoin change our future?
Alles over anonimiteit en privacy tijden: Everything about anonimity and privacy during AnonymIT

Bij je studievereniging kan je een ticke: You can buy a ticket activation code at your study association.
Het blaadje waar je Ticketactivatiecode:
The paper which holds your ticket activation code also serves as your ticket, after being activated.
If you would accidentally lose this paper, you can always reprint it by visiting "My profile",
after you have been registered.
Ook of je wel of niet meewilt met de bus: Your preference regarding your choice of transport, can also be changed later at "My profile".
Ticketactivatiecode (verkrijgbaar bij je: Ticket activation code (available at your study association)
